message:
"Hey doc, it's 6:26 AM. My glucose was 150 mg/dL before breakfast, not great, I know. I had a late dinner last night and didn't get around to logging it. I'm trying, really, but this diabetes thing is just so hard sometimes. I guess I need to be more consistent with my meals and logging. Any tips for making it easier?"

Your message acknowledges the importance

"Hey doc, it's 16:06. I've been slacking off on my weight tracking lately. Current weight is around 82kg, up from 80kg last time I checked. I've been feeling a bit down about my diabetes management lately, you know? It's just hard to keep up with all the logging and meal planning. I've been making excuses and putting it off. I know I need to get back
